title: Detox Plus 120 caps by Bio Essence
sitename: Acupuncture Needles & Chinese Herbs | Shop Acu-Market
cleaned_text: Assists natural liver detoxification process · Supports cellular health · Promotes healthy metabolism Product Description: Detox Plus (Formally Inner Shield) contains a blend of powerful herbal extracts specifically formulated to support bodily health and well-being. This formulation features vitamins that support a healthy metabolism; reduce oxidative stress; and support the flushing of toxins from the body.* Form: 120 Capsules Suggested Use: Adults take 2 capsules twice daily with meal. Please consult with your physician before taking this product.
